main.name: Lê Xuân Thành
main.description: Born to be a negotiator, super friendly. Prefer peaceful places. Love guitar and singing
main.bio: I am really into people and nature. I love coding & singing. Always coding when I am sad. Haven't got any 'girlfriend' yet! Love photography, too! Have just bought a new camera (in September 2019) and will become a photographer soon. Welcome to my little diary!
main.contactmessage: Contact me in case looking for help :D

address.street: 38, ngõ 86 Tô Vĩnh Diện, Thanh Xuân, Hà Nội

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: Junior - Major in Information of Comunication and Technology
education.description: We are studing with the best environment, apart from others major. Lovely lecturers.

work.title: Senior Front-end, Project Manager
work.description: I love the working culture here. Really friendly though. The best thing is chances to work with foreigner developers. I have learnt and grow up alot here!

work.title: Junior Website Developer
work.description: Luckily having some neighbours ordered me making websites for their businesses. Therefore, I earned alot of motivation and passion in coding when I was younger.

projects.title: Biomedico Pharmacy Website
projects.category: A small website used for pharmacy start-up

projects.title: Kanban Working Management App
projects.category: (private) My first website build fully by me. Help my dad to manage his staff working process :D

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
